nodes.text: Ista Kezever was a journalist at the time of the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Kezever published an article in the Corellia Times about the repair of viewscreens called "The Broken Viewscreen, or How to Save a Picture Forever." Ista Kezever also published the article "Galaxy in Review ... Intergalactic Report 12.1" in the Naboo Herald about changes in politics and technology.

When the developers of the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies released the "Publish 12.1" update on January 25, 2005, a loading screen styled as a news article written by Ista Kezever was shown to all players of the game, describing various changes to the game in an in-universe style. Ista Kezever is also credited as the author of "The Broken Viewscreen, or How to Save a Picture Forever," a guide published on the official Star Wars Galaxies website that explained how players could combine various looted items to create posters and paintings.
